bibl.title: Acta Alexandrinorum. En allemand, avec résumé en anglais.
Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke)

series.title: Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete
ArchPF

bibl.note: Edition of a tiny fragment that sheds new light on the charges leveled against C. Vibius Maximus, Prefect of Egypt in AD 103-107, who was accused of maladministration, and of having an improper affair with a young boy. It is tempting to recognize a reference to the latter in the fragment. Fayoum (?), 2nd / 3rd cent. AD.
